website_summaries.verdict: A stable, fun-to-ride bicycle that transitions well from paved roads to light trails.
pros: Larger-diameter knobby tires, at 27.5 inches, provide a softer ride on bumpy roads and trails
Front fork shock absorbers handle big bumps well
Assembly takes as little as 30 minutes for experienced users
Wheels are well-balanced out of the box and derailleurs need little tuning
cons: Instructions included with bike are sparse, leaving less experienced owners in the dark on assembly

customer_reviews.title: Best bike for petite woman
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about my ability to put this together. But, with a little help from the internet, I got it together and it is wonderful!! I am only 4'11" and it is hard to find an adult bike to fit me. This is one of the few petite women's bikes that I could find. I love to ride and am training for a long distance ride. I can't imagine finding a better option!!
customer_reviews.author: gswa

customer_reviews.title: Is it a good bicycle?
customer_reviews.text: I received the bicycle September 22,2017 and put the bicycle together September 23,2017 for my daughter. Putting the bicycle together was fairly simple. I didn't even read the instructions. I fallowd the picture diagrams. After putting the bicycle together, I inspected the bicycle and realized the bicycle is well made for the price. I'm 6'3" and weight 210 and I test ride the bicycle and it handled very well. The paint work is impressive. The gears changed smoothly and it handled my weight very well. If you are looking for a quality bicycle for yourself or family member, even as a gift, I recommend this bicycle.
customer_reviews.author: Ghyfydghrooocccfeeeepppcc livvvvvfssspvvppppjjj Vudyifyd,yidzjcgs,jgcc see Schn,uzbek ex :-/:-/highh

customer_reviews.title: Took it out with my friend who has a $2k ...
customer_reviews.text: Took it out with my friend who has a $2k Heller hardtail, and we switched bikes halfway through and my friend was really surprised and impressed with the Eva2. I only paid $207 for mine, as a returned "scratch and dent special" through Amazon Warehouse. I'm still trying to find the scratch or dent, so I think I got a killer deal!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Carden

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bike. My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as advertised. Very nice bike. My daughter loves it. Easy to assemble as well if you have basic experience/understanding of such things. The only flaw I could comment on is that the rear derailleur hanger came bent out of the box, making tuning a challenge. After carefully bending it back (with breath held expecting a break), the rear derailleur tuned just fine. Great bike for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Moses

customer_reviews.title: Fist new bike
customer_reviews.text: Woman loved the bike an we ride all over the place came with everything needed
customer_reviews.author: shaun wagler

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bike overall. But chain slips off easily. Was difficult to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Sommer Garth

customer_reviews.title: Raleigh knows how to build bikes!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new bike. Really smooth ride and fits me perfectly. I should have bought it years ago. Off road riding has never been so fun. I can keep up with my 10 year old now.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Burchard

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike
customer_reviews.text: Great quality bike for the price. Bought for my daughter. Took about 45 minutes to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly and nicely boxed. Bike is great for cruising on flat ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and nicely boxed. Bike is great for cruising on flat canal and rail trails as well as some light mountain bike trail riding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Quality. Light. Easy to assemble. Wife loves it and perfect size for her.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bike for our daughter. A little heavy but great for 1st full size bike.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L Boyles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seat is a little hard but great size and performance. Assembly was easy.
customer_reviews.author: North West

customer_reviews.title: No kick stand. Wish it had one
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy bike. Love it. Doesn’t come with a kick stand.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Calkins

product_meta.title: Raleigh Bikes Eva 2 Women's Bike
product_meta.description: Get outside for some fresh air this weekend and have fun with your new two-wheeled companion, eva 2! from town to trail and back again, this entry-level women's mountain bike is equally at home on the dirt as it is on the pavement. Built with the beginner rider in mind, the eva 2 offers comfort and control with a low stand over height and women's specific geometry. The cushy raleigh mountain plush saddle and small diamond grips are also made just for the ladies (thank you very much). add the sr sun tour suspension fork and the durable, double wall weinmann 27.5 inch wheels to make any trail a breeze. Shimano revo twist shifters provide reliable shifting to ensure you are in the right gear every time. Women riders-you can roll with confidence knowing these bikes are made just for you. Raleigh bicycles are designed around one simple idea: fun. It's an idea that inspired the very first bikes way back in 1887 and continues to inspire how things are done today. Hop on a raleigh and enjoy the ride
feature_bullets: Made for riding moderate distance on light trails and pavement
Designed for comfort with women's-specific upright geometry, a squishy suspension fork, Women's specific comfort saddle, and Women's specific grips
Offers easy to use Shimano Revo twist shifter to take you through 21 different speeds
Features a lightweight aluminum Women's specific frame and wide Kenda 27.5x2. 1 inch tires for stability on varied terrain
